attributes.action: E scooter owners to have licence  basic road safety. To ban from pavement riding
attributes.background: Look into enforcing E Scooters off pavements. Make E scooter owners have knowledge road safety . Make owners of e scooters have licence to ride roads not pavements

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Require licenses to use an electric bike or electric scooter
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706750

More funding to enforce traffic offences committed by cycle/scooter users
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710396
